[Battle Creek,] Wednesday, March 27, 1889 
     Had a long talk with Brother Conradi, speaking plainly of the unchristlike spirit in which nearly all of our ministering brethren acted a part. When the questioning voice, full of earnest interest, should have been asking, "Watchmen, what of the night?" there were pale faces peering out into the darkness. The response comes, "The night cometh, and also the day."
